## Checklist

<!-- Check all that apply before submitting -->

### General
- [ ] My code/content follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) document
- [ ] I have checked that no similar PR already exists
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own changes

### Documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] Content is clear and well-written
- [ ] All claims are properly cited with sources
- [ ] Links are working and point to correct locations
- [ ] Frontmatter is properly configured
- [ ] Sidebar position is appropriate
- [ ] Added appropriate admonitions (tip, warning, danger)
- [ ] Formatting is consistent with existing docs
- [ ] Spell-checked and grammar-checked

### Code (if applicable)
- [ ] Code is properly commented
- [ ] Following existing code conventions
- [ ] No console.log or debug statements left in code

### Testing
- [ ] Build completes successfully
- [ ] No broken links introduced
- [ ] Tested on multiple browsers (if UI changes)
- [ ] Mobile responsive (if UI changes)
